description:
2017年5月20日的大学英语四级口语考试小组讨论部分（Group Discussion）的主题为如何用PPT展现一堂课。当然，对于广大考生来说，课堂的具体内容有很多，选择的空间余地也很大，建议广大考生选择自己最为熟悉的话题来进行论述，这样会使得整个对话流程比较顺畅。下面小编就自己熟悉的话题---《红字》为蓝本进行举例说明。

---Hey, have you any idea about our lecture? And what about the main points and how do we support our ideas? Lastly, what methods should we use to present our lecture?

---As for the main idea of our lecture, it is mainly about the pathetic love story taking place in the colonial America. And to support our idea, we should take into account the background then . At that time, Puritanism was prevalent, especially in colonial America. And the doctrines of Puritanism are original sin and atonement. The heroin’s marriage is without love and she fell in love with the priest. Consequently, she gave birth to baby. Even though she had committed the adultery, in the eyes of others, she was unforgivable; she followed her inner heart voice. At last, we should focus on explaining the character and history background so that the readers can have a better understanding of the main idea.

以上就是小编为广大考生整理的大学英语四级口语考试小提示，希望能够在接下来的考试当中帮助到广大考生！
